name: dereuromark/cakephp-geo
description: A CakePHP plugin around geocoding tools and helpers.

scripts.test-setup: [ ! -f phpunit.phar ] && wget https://phar.phpunit.de/phpunit-8.5.2.phar && mv phpunit-8.5.2.phar phpunit.phar || true
scripts.stan-setup: cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev phpstan/phpstan:^0.12 && mv composer.backup composer.json
scripts.lowest-setup: composer update --prefer-lowest --prefer-stable --prefer-dist --no-interaction && cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev dereuromark/composer-prefer-lowest && mv composer.backup composer.json
